version_description:
·Fix a bug that players may can not see other players' equipments on leaderboard.
·Performance optimization.

·We are completely revamping our English translation. Many thanks to the help of one of our awesome fans, John!
·Elite Monsters are Invading! New powerful monsters have been spotted prowling in the cave. With greater risks bring greater rewards!
·Ne

·Fix some critical bugs in v1.0.2.

What's new in v1.0.2
·We are completely revamping our English translation. Many thanks to the help of one of our awesome fans, John!
·Elite Monsters are Invading! New powerful monsters have been spotted prow

·We are adding full support for the Korean Language.
·Re-design these skills: Forcefield, Mana Siphon.
·Re-balance some skills。
·Add weakpoint for Huge Tunnel Worm, Satan, and re-balance their attributes.
·Fix bugs.
·Improvement and optimiz

·All new Hell difficulty is available. Are you ready?
·Challenge 20 all new floors, along with the monsters and bosses within.
·All new Hell difficulty equipment to hunt for.
·Added a new equipment set for Nightmare difficulty.

·All new Hell difficulty is available. Are you ready?
·Challenge 20 all new floors, along with the monsters and bosses within.
·All new Hell difficulty equipment to hunt for.
·Added a new equipment set for Nightmare difficulty.

· New play mode: Dreamworld Challenge
In this play mode, you will challenge your ultimate survivability skills in.a strage new world. You also.have a chance at getting powerful rare special equipment. But be · warned, you only have one chance...
· N

· Full optimization of ranking system;
· Optimized battery usage.

·Added 20 floors' worth of brand-new monsters and bosses;
·Added lots of new Cave and Dreamworld armor sets for you to collect;
·You can now watch a new video to get free crystals.
Bug fixes.

·Added 20 floors' worth of brand-new monsters and bosses.
·Added lots of new Cave and Dreamworld armor sets for you to collect.

Bug fixes.

·Added lots of new Cave and Dreamworld armor sets for you to collect.
· Purgatory Difficulty now open: tons of new Purgatory Difficulty gear and Dreamworld armor
· Bug fixes.
Improvement and optimizations for better overall performance.

· 6 NEW achievements and more crystal bonus.
· Optimize for iPhone X.
· Optimize the compatibility on higher phone system.

· Multiple linkage equipment of Gumballs & Dungeons are newly added
· Some bad game experience has been optimized
· Some bugs have been fixed

· Add the "Labor Day" exclusive achievement
· The BUG that part of the interface is covered on a full scree has been fixed
· Some bad game experience has been optimized

· Cancel the existing rank system
· New 'World Heroes’system
· New 'Mysterious Adventurers’system
· Add two new suits: 'Curse of the Loser' and 'Whisper of the Mystery'
· Max Lvl. of coin enhancement equipment is increased to +5 from +3
·

· The forced termination of the game during the suspension of filing has been resolved.
· The BUG where Pot has a chance not to drop items under the Purgatory difficulty has been fixed.

· The impact of the button at the bottom of iPhoneX on partial interface operations has been optimized.
· Daily task deletion function has been added, so that the player may clear up unwanted tasks.
· The BUG in Floor 91 of the Purgatory of unforced

·A brand new expansion pack "Dimensional Crack": 2 new NPCs and new scenes, please stay tuned for new gameplay and functions
·Increase Max enhancement from Level 10 to Level 15
·A new set of equipment interactive with Lost Island 2 is added

1. Spring Festival is right around the corner! The Lion Dance Helmet added to celebrate the Lunar New Year, and it can be obtained via KTplay community events.
2. New gameplay! Players can fish in the town and get various rewards which are all gold qua

What’s New:
Cave fishing:
you can now catch fish in the cave, too.
Fishing in town:
you now have 24 free attempts each day.
The number of attempts you can buy with crystals has been increased from 10 to 24, but the price has not changed.

Fishing:
When fishing, you can trigger a lot of rare tasks
Fishing rewards increased
Announcements:
An announcements button has been added to the main menu
City tasks:
Reward rate for city tasks increased

Cave events
New cave events added
Comics
1 chapter added in the Mysterious Princess comics (unlocked in city events).
Account log out button added in the authorization window.
Copyright added in the settings window.
Formula optimization<

Fishing
The Fishing event activities are now improved. During the event, there is a higher chance of getting various rewards and better catches.

The Adventures in the Rift
New daily "The Adventures in the Rift" feature, you can complete the task given by Sartos to unlock this feature
You can get new dark gold equipment and sets of equipment from The Adventures in the Rift
